name: Trace God
description:
Mistaken for a mysterious alien, help a thunder god escape a secret facility. 

NOTES: Level isn't finished but enjoy bopping around. If that's fun then i'll come back and make a full thing out of it. Below you can find the gameboy rom as well as the Analogue Pocket file.

CONTROLS

  • Directions = Arrows or WASD
  • A = Z or J
  • B = X or K
  • Start = Return
